form.IN:
Množinska oblika samostalnika je običajno
fish
, uporabljamo pa tudi
fishes
.

sense.def:
A fish
je žival z repom in plavutmi, ki živi v vodi.

Fish
je ribje meso, ki ga uživamo kot živilo.

To fish
pomeni truditi se, da bi ujeli ribe.

seg.quote: They went fishing and caught half a dozen trout.

sense.def:
To fish a particular area of water
pomeni truditi se, da bi v določenem vodnem območju ujeli ribe.

seg.quote: It was the first trawler ever to fish those waters.

sense.def:
To fish for information or praise
pomeni truditi se, da bi posredno izmamili podatke ali pohvalo.

seg.quote: I think he was just fishing for compliments.

sense.def:
To fish something out of a liquid or a container
pomeni nekaj odstraniti iz tekočine ali posode;

seg.quote: He fished a gold watch from his pocket.
